Shell Gaming Dominion

SGDM is the world created by author and programmer Benjamin Wulf. Writing since 2004 in a journal format and more recently in markdown. The book c2025 in an experiential loose collaboration of out of Leo Dvorak's diary in the building of a super computer coined [TBD] In writing c2025 and aiming to bring programming into the fiction form to inspire the net runners of tomorrow.
